entry.et: Middle English, from Old English līnen, from līn flax, from Latin linum flax; akin to Greek linon flax, thread

def.dt: :cloth made of flax and noted for its strength, coolness, and luster
:clothing or household articles made of linen cloth or similar fabric
:paper made from linen fibers or with a linen finish
:linen (as tablecloths and napkins) for the table
